title: Who thinks that movement speed should be increase to all champion?
body:
Soo that people would complain less about skillshots and make the game a little bit faster paced.

If you wanted the game shorter just make everyone move faster instead of making the game super snowbally.

replies.body: yet people cry about the game being fast paced and snowbally as it is

> [{quoted}](name=jwebb0113,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IVIQ2lZd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-30T18:27:10.355+0000)
>
> yet people cry about the game being fast paced and snowbally as it is

Yea if they reduce cast speed and increase movement speed, it might look like nothing but at least the game will reward the skilled players at snowballing and not depending on itemization raw power.
yet make those champs who arent reliant on skill shots more powerful

> [{quoted}](name=jwebb0113,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IVIQ2lZd,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-08-30T18:31:14.653+0000)
>
> yet make those champs who arent reliant on skill shots more powerful

Technically not, because you have equal speed or even more faster than them.
but they cant hit their skill shots... creating power to those who have point and click abilities or adcs who right click

> [{quoted}](name=jwebb0113,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IVIQ2lZd,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-08-30T18:33:21.274+0000)
>
> but they cant hit their skill shots... creating power to those who have point and click abilities or adcs who right click

I just said to reduce cast time for mages if you are reading the comments.

but auto attacks are still point and click and reliable 

so they would receive a indirect buff cuz of your purposed changes
all bruisers should have 360 starting ms no exceptions
{{champion:64}} is a bruiser just a heads up
Underpowered is a stretch, Id say he is balanced.

This was the case back when boot upgrades were a thing.  It wasn't the greatest points in the game as it demanded champions that could take the most advantage of that movespeed be mandatory picks because they got so much more benefit from it.
